description: The AP-03 RTO serves the Chittoor district in Andhra Pradesh, managing vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits for the region. While the state transitioned to a unified AP-39 registration series for new vehicles in 2019, AP-03 remains the active legacy code and administrative identifier for the Chittoor RTO office.
address: No. 1 & 2, Industrial Estate, Puttur Road, Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh
